thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Esperite Provided With 500,000 Euros Of New Funding Until March 2

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Esperite Provided With 500,000 Euros Of New Funding Until March 2
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - ESPERITE NV:
* REG-ESPERITE (ESP): EUR 500,000 OF NEW FUNDING PROVIDED BY EUROPEAN SELECT GROWTH OPPORTUNITIES FUND UNTIL MARCH 2, 2018.
* ‍EUR 5,010,000 OF NOTES OUT OF TOTAL COMMITMENT AMOUNTING TO EUR 9 MILLION HAVE BEEN CONVERTED INTO SHARES​
* ‍EUR 247,500 OF WARRANTS OUT OF A TOTAL POTENTIAL AMOUNT OF EUR 4,050,000 HAVE BEEN EXERCISED INTO SHARES​
* ESPERITE‘S STRATEGY TOWARDS MARKET DEVELOPMENT ACTIVITIES AND AGREED TO SUBSCRIBE FOR NEW TRANCHE OF EUR 250,000 TODAY UPON REQUEST OF ESPERITE
* ‍EXPECTS TO ISSUE TOTAL OF EUR 500,000 OF PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF NOTES WITH WARRANTS ATTACHED BEFORE MARCH 2 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
